name: lifetracker-pro
description: LifeTracker Pro - A comprehensive health and wellness tracking application

scripts.start: echo "Please use 'npm run start:frontend' or 'npm run start:backend'" && exit 1
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:backend -- --fix
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
